foreclosureCriteria.name: InForeclosure
foreclosureCriteria.description: Whether the property is currently in foreclosure (Preforeclosure, Auction, or Bank Owned stages)

foreclosureCriteria.name: ForeclosureStage
foreclosureCriteria.description: The current stage of foreclosure - Preforeclosure, Auction, or Bank Owned

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticeDocumentType
foreclosureCriteria.description: The type of foreclosure document for judicial or non-judicial foreclosures

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticeRecordingDate
foreclosureCriteria.description: The date the foreclosure document was recorded at the county recorder's office

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticePublishedDate
foreclosureCriteria.description: The date the foreclosure record was published to PropertyRadar

foreclosureCriteria.name: OriginalSaleDate
foreclosureCriteria.description: The date the foreclosure sale was initially published to be held on before any postponements

foreclosureCriteria.name: ForeclosureSaleDate
foreclosureCriteria.description: The scheduled date of the foreclosure auction after any postponements

foreclosureCriteria.name: SaleTime
foreclosureCriteria.description: The time at which the foreclosure auction will be held

foreclosureCriteria.name: SalePlace
foreclosureCriteria.description: The address and city for the foreclosure auction

foreclosureCriteria.name: PublishedBid
foreclosureCriteria.description: The published bid in the notice of trustee sale, typically the total amount owed on the loan

foreclosureCriteria.name: PublishedBidToEstValue
foreclosureCriteria.description: The published bid as a percentage of the estimated property value

foreclosureCriteria.name: DefaultAmount
foreclosureCriteria.description: The amount required to bring the loan current as of the default date

foreclosureCriteria.name: DefaultDate
foreclosureCriteria.description: The date on which the default amount was calculated

foreclosureCriteria.name: ForeclosingLoanPosition
foreclosureCriteria.description: The position of the loan in foreclosure versus other open loans on the property

foreclosureCriteria.name: LisPendensType
foreclosureCriteria.description: Type of lawsuit being noticed as pending, including foreclosure on mortgage/HOA/lien or other action

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticePageNumber
foreclosureCriteria.description: Page number in recorder's book, used by some counties to record transactions

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticeDocumentNumber
foreclosureCriteria.description: The document number assigned by the recorder's office to identify a particular document

foreclosureCriteria.name: NoticeBookNumber
foreclosureCriteria.description: Recorder's book number, used by some counties to record transactions

foreclosureCriteria.name: Trustee
foreclosureCriteria.description: The name of the trustee handling the foreclosure

foreclosureCriteria.name: TrusteePhone
foreclosureCriteria.description: The phone number to call for updated information on the trustee sale

foreclosureCriteria.name: TSNumber
foreclosureCriteria.description: Trustee Sales Number, the unique number assigned by trustee to identify a foreclosure

foreclosureCriteria.name: Attorney
foreclosureCriteria.description: Name of attorney involved in the preparation of the notice

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Relative Date: Accepts preset date strings like 'Last 30 Days' or specific dates and ranges
